name: Yallaiah Onteru
title: SAP Project Systems Lead
professional_summary: Utilized SAP PS to streamline project cost forecasting and budgeting, ensuring accurate revenue reporting and integration of project variations, which enhanced financial accuracy and decision-making.
Implemented SAP Project Systems (PS) modules, providing functional expertise and guidance to clients, resulting in improved project management and operational efficiency.
Configured SAP PS structures, including Work Breakdown Structure (WBS), Network, Milestones, and Cost Planning, to align with client business requirements and enhance project execution.
Integrated SAP PS with intercompany processes, ensuring seamless data flow and compliance with business requirements across multiple entities.
Designed and deployed SAP PS functionalities such as Material Requirement Planning (MRP), Project Quotation, and Time Sheets, optimizing resource allocation and project tracking.
Facilitated requirements gathering sessions with stakeholders, translating business needs into SAP PS configurations and improving system usability.
Utilized Fiori Gantt Chart for intuitive project scheduling, enhancing visibility and coordination across project timelines.
Implemented SAP PS Goods Issues module, streamlining material management and reducing discrepancies in project inventory.
Provided training and instruction on SAP PS products to clients, ensuring effective adoption and utilization of the system.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to blueprint SAP PS implementations, ensuring alignment with business processes and objectives.
Troubleshot and resolved SAP PS configuration issues, maintaining system integrity and minimizing downtime.
Developed complex estimates within SAP PS, supporting accurate project budgeting and cost control.
Enhanced SAP PS reporting capabilities, enabling clients to generate detailed budget and revenue reports for better financial oversight.
Worked on SAP PS roll-out projects, ensuring successful implementation and integration with existing systems.
Supported post-implementation support for SAP PS, addressing user queries and system enhancements.
Conducted regular code reviews and debugging sessions to ensure high-quality SAP PS configurations.
Participated in daily stand-up meetings, aligning team efforts with project goals and timelines.
Mentored junior team members on SAP PS functionalities, fostering knowledge sharing and team growth.

Cloud Platforms: AWS (S3, SageMaker, Lambda, EC2, RDS, Redshift, Bedrock)
Azure (ML Studio, Data Factory, Databricks, Cosmos DB)
GCP (Big Query, Vertex AI, Cloud SQL)
